description: Monitor for newly executed processes that may abuse Unix shell commands and scripts for execution. Analytic 1 - Look for unusual Unix shell process creation. sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=macos_secure | search (command="sh" OR command="bash" OR command="zsh") | eval suspicious_process=if(like(command_line, "%.sh" OR "%.bash" OR "%.zsh"), "Yes", "No") | where suspicious_process="Yes"
